title: #2121 - Jonathan Haidt
description: Listen to this episode from The Joe Rogan Experience on Spotify. Jonathan Haidt is a social psychologist, professor, and author. His latest book, "The Anxious Generation: How the Great Rewiring of Childhood Is Causing an Epidemic of Mental Illness," will be available March 26.www.jonathanhaidt.com Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
